use.flag: Enable UKSM patch. This is an improvement upon KSM
Enable cjktty patch. You could see CJK fonts in TTY
Enable Xanmod patch. XanMod is a general-purpose Linux kernel distribution with custom settings and new features.
Enable Xanmod-Cacule patch. CacULE is a CFS patchset based on interactivity score mechanism feature, inspired by FreeBSD's ULE scheduler.
